original_title: Brent Terhune : What on Flat Earth!?
overview: A punchline-packed look at life as told by one of the Internet’s favorite masters of satire, Brent Terhune. he’s got a mortgage, Pokemon Cards, probably a ghost, annoying neighbors and a comedian’s take on the mundane.
tagline: Crack open an Emotional Support Beer and watch with your whole family!
title: Brent Terhune : What on Flat Earth!?
